H3.text: what are the religions practiced in indonesia. Islam

A6.text: Islam is the largest religion in Indonesia, with 87.06% of the Indonesian population identifying themselves as Muslims, based on civil registry data in 2023.

A7.text: Javanese rulers eventually fled to Bali, where over 2.5 million Indonesians practiced their version of Hinduism.
